forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 11am. Cloudy, with a high near 34. Northeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 24. North wind around 3 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Boston, today’s morning unfolds under a veil of dreary clouds, whispering promises of snow showers that may linger before retreating. A curious chill dances in the air, with temperatures hovering around a cool 34 degrees, while the northeast wind adds a bite, reminding all that winter is still holding its ground. As the day progresses, the clouds will remain steadfast, casting a soft, muted light over the city—a canvas of gray offering an understated beauty rather than the harsh glare often found on brighter days.

As night falls, you can expect a chill deepening, with temperatures dipping down as the city prepares to settle into a cool 24 degrees. In the spirit of the season, dressing in layers will serve you well; a cozy sweater under a warm coat, perhaps paired with a snug scarf and hat, will keep those winter winds at bay. These conditions invite simple pleasures—taking a stroll through one of Boston’s historic neighborhoods, perhaps stopping for a warm cup of coffee or sharing a leisurely conversation with a friend as the city embraces its quiet charm. In a day that invites introspection and warmth, revel in the soft solitude that this winter morning brings.
